titles: Lillies invitation. [To th]ose that have had no coughs, nor colds, this winter, to dine with him on Christmas day.
notes: Verse: "Admire ye Mortalls! strange newes does appear! ..."
Imperfect: torn at side affecting title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Lilly, William, 1602-1681 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
